mapper.update: update tip set tip_view_cnt = tip_view_cnt + 1 where tip_no = #{tip_no}
mapper.select: select tip_no, tip_title, tip_ctnts, tip_date, tip_view_cnt, tip_prdt_pic, tip_prdt_path from tip where tip_no = #{tip_no}

select tip_no, tip_title, tip_ctnts, tip_date, tip_prdt_pic, tip_prdt_path, tip_view_cnt from tip
where tip_title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
where tip_no like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by tip_no desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select count(tip_no) cnt from tip
where tip_title like concat('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
where tip_ctnts like concat('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
select tip_no, tip_title, tip_ctnts, tip_date, tip_prdt_path from tip
mapper.insert: insert into tip (tip_no, tip_title, tip_ctnts, tip_date, tip_prdt_pic, tip_prdt_path ) values (0, #{tip_title}, #{tip_ctnts}, now(), #{tip_prdt_pic}, #{tip_prdt_path})
